item.title: TR: Interactive Python VSCode/Mac?
item.description: Legend Potential Audience: Learners wanting to use a free but industrial-grade Python IDE on a Mac. Anyone having trouble using Python on Visual Studio Code because it ‘won’t run’. Why Mac? Unless you are Jabba, the Meister Programmer, I advise all learners to use MacOS for the smoothest possible journey in their quest to become programmers. That’s because at its heart, MacOS is simply a flavor of Unix and you can’t do serious programming on Windows–that’s a fact acknowledged by Microsoft, too (hence their providing the WSL).
